## Public Member Functions

### determineCalleeSaves() {#a1d6657eee2635fc25cefd2d33163f5e9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void Mips16FrameLowering::determineCalleeSaves (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &amp; SavedRegs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger">RegScavenger</a> &#42; RS) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This method determines which of the registers reported by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo/#ad71b5bc0aa81f5dec06cbfecaf2f7183">TargetRegisterInfo::getCalleeSavedRegs()</a> should actually get saved.

The default implementation checks populates the <code>SavedRegs</code> bitset with all registers which are modified in the function, targets may override this function to save additional registers. This method also sets up the register scavenger ensuring there is a free register or a frameindex available. This method should not be called by any passes outside of PEI, because it may change state passed in by <code>MF</code> and <code>RS</code>. The preferred interface outside PEI is getCalleeSaves.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16framelowering-h/#l00041">41</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16framelowering-h">Mips16FrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16framelowering-cpp/#l00154">154</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16framelowering-cpp">Mips16FrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### hasReservedCallFrame() {#ab242e5924ca5ef32768676a9e81b248f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool Mips16FrameLowering::hasReservedCallFrame (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
hasReservedCallFrame - Under normal circumstances, when a frame pointer is not required, we reserve argument space for call sites in the function immediately on entry to the current function.

This eliminates the need for add/sub sp brackets around call sites. Returns true if the call frame is included as part of the stack frame.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16framelowering-h/#l00039">39</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16framelowering-h">Mips16FrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16framelowering-cpp/#l00147">147</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16framelowering-cpp">Mips16FrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### restoreCalleeSavedRegisters() {#ad42e9514f06b847f7c06af29d7b42184}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool Mips16FrameLowering::restoreCalleeSavedRegisters (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/calleesavedinfo">CalleeSavedInfo</a> &gt; CSI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42; TRI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
restoreCalleeSavedRegisters - Issues instruction(s) to restore all callee saved registers and returns true if it isn&#39;t possible / profitable to do so by issuing a series of load instructions via loadRegToStackSlot().

If it returns true, and any of the registers in CSI is not restored, it sets the corresponding Restored flag in CSI to false. Returns false otherwise.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16framelowering-h/#l00034">34</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16framelowering-h">Mips16FrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16framelowering-cpp/#l00133">133</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16framelowering-cpp">Mips16FrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### spillCalleeSavedRegisters() {#a2eb8fb675dfceaccbf3a2dbdfee2e9a3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool Mips16FrameLowering::spillCalleeSavedRegisters (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/calleesavedinfo">CalleeSavedInfo</a> &gt; CSI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42; TRI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
spillCalleeSavedRegisters - Issues instruction(s) to spill all callee saved registers and returns true if it isn&#39;t possible / profitable to do so by issuing a series of store instructions via storeRegToStackSlot().

Returns false otherwise.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16framelowering-h/#l00028">28</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16framelowering-h">Mips16FrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16framelowering-cpp/#l00107">107</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16framelowering-cpp">Mips16FrameLowering.cpp</a>.
